hero.description: I am passionate about Frontend and Backend development with experience in Javascript, React.js, Angular.js, MySQL, PHP, and Laravel. I specialize in building modern, fast, and scalable digital solutions, focusing on user experience and code quality.

about.description: Frontend and Backend developer experienced in multiple technologies. Passionate about building efficient and scalable web applications. Self-taught, committed to continuous learning and best development practices.

list1: Full-stack web application development (frontend and backend)
Focus on performance and user experience
list2: Integration of external APIs and third-party services

items.title: Frontend Developer - Personal Project
items.description: Developing modern web applications using React and Next.js.

items.title: Backend Developer - Freelance Project
items.description: Building RESTful APIs and managing MySQL databases.

items.title: Diploma in Web Development with NEXTJS
items.description: Learned Next.js, Tailwind, databases, and TypeScript.

items.title: Diploma in Web Development with JavaScript
items.description: Learned HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and SQL databases.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: I specialize in Frontend development to create modern and functional websites using technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Angular, and Laravel. I always focus on providing optimized and scalable solutions.

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: Backend applications development using Node.js, ensuring smooth integration with databases and APIs to offer optimal performance and an exceptional user experience.

webapps.title: Web Applications
webapps.description: Building customized web applications with ReactJS, focusing on creating dynamic, fast, and responsive user experiences.

ecommerce.title: Ecommerce
ecommerce.description: E-commerce project in PHP with modular (MVC) architecture to manage products, users, and orders. Includes a REST API for CRUD and an admin panel with AdminLTE 3.2.0. Focused on scalability and code organization.

pos.title: Point of Sale System (POS)
pos.description: POS system in PHP (MVC) with multi-branch support, roles, inventory management, billing (Colombia), reports, and daily cash management. Practical system for development and commercialization.

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.description: Marketplace built in PHP8/MySQL: RESTful API, payment gateways, user registration, conversational interface, and multivendor system.

filemanager.title: File Manager
filemanager.description: Document management system developed with PHP/CodeIgniter 4/MySQL for creating, editing, organizing, and advanced searching of files, built with scalable MVC architecture.
